column4: hey linner|STARBUCKS - how's it all going? Configurations sorted out OK ?
absolutely not! :)  That's why I'm on my windows partition right now
but thanks for asking! :)
if I could at least get the clock working properly... then I could use it a little more...
so for now i'm going to have to use the windows partition until the final breezy is released
how's everything on your side/
hmm - OK.  sudo invoke-rc.d ntpdate  doesn't reset your clock ?
well, immediately yes... but it doesn't keep it updated
I just discovered "synergy" - cool little prog that lets me use mouse and keyboard on two mavhines at once :D
oh how cool is that?
send me the link... I'd like to check it out
it's like magic *grin* !
LOL
apt-cache search synergy  :)
it's in universe
oh okay... i'll give it a whirl when I'm back on the ubuntu boot
http://synergy2.sourceforge.net/running.html
oh you rock man
it works with windows too, apparently
does it have to be a wireless keyboard?
re; 09:56 < linner|STARBUCKS> thoreauputic: does it have to be a wireless keyboard?
answer is "no"
